name: D20
description:
D20 is a 3D platformer made by a single developer that is currently in beta.

A long time ago a weapon known as the D100 was created to defeat Misfortune and did so. After the fight the D100 was kept as a way to remember the battle. But when Misfortune returned they shattered it and the pieces were scattered throughout the world. During a town meeting in Dice Docks a D20 volunteered to help bring the pieces back together to defeat Misfortune once again.

This game isn't done! Please report any bugs found in the comments!

Current Focus:

Polish Main Menu

Add more sound effects

Add hub world

Remake animations

Add 2 more D100 pieces to the first world

Next update will either be a small patch or adding the hub world and its 12 D100 pieces!
